name: Kobold Cup
description: The Kobold King will sip when he damn well pleases.

abilities.name: One for the Road
abilities.description: Grants movement speed to nearby allies for a short while on cast.
notes: Interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
The buff of successive casts does not stack but refreshes the duration instead.

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
